# writeOnly

**Type Property**

Opens the file for writing only.

## Declaration

```swift
static var writeOnly: FileDescriptor.AccessMode { get }
```

## Discussion

The corresponding C constant is `O_WRONLY`.

## Creating an Access Mode

- **readOnly**: Opens the file for reading only.
- **readWrite**: Opens the file for reading and writing.

items.description: Opens the file for reading only.
items.name: readOnly

items.description: Opens the file for reading and writing.
